options.content:
### Reconciliation Overview
Investigate non-PASS checks first.

targets.rawSql: SELECT failed FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_summary ORDER BY period_date DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT status FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_summary ORDER BY period_date DESC LIMIT 1;

WITH latest AS (SELECT MAX(period_date) AS p FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_tests) SELECT domain, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE pass) AS passed, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE NOT pass) AS failed, COUNT(*) AS total FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_tests WHERE period_date = (SELECT p FROM latest) GROUP BY domain ORDER BY domain;

WITH latest AS (SELECT MAX(period_date) AS p FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_tests) SELECT period_date AS "Period Date", domain AS "Domain", CASE test_name
  WHEN 'cash_flow_margin_derivation' THEN 'Cash Flow Margin Calculation'
  WHEN 'category_sum_coverage_ok' THEN 'Category Sum Coverage'
  WHEN 'cat_family_alignment' THEN 'Family Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_food_alignment' THEN 'Food Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_household_alignment' THEN 'Household Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_mortgage_alignment' THEN 'Mortgage Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'daily_eom_matches_fact_eom (sum across accounts)' THEN 'Daily EOM vs Fact EOM Balance'
  WHEN 'equation_assets_minus_liabilities' THEN 'Assets - Liabilities = Net Worth'
  WHEN 'expense_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Expense % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Expense Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_within_bounds' THEN 'Expense Ratio Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'income_uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized Income %'
  WHEN 'mbs_expenses_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Expenses Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_income_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Income Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_net_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Net Match Fact'
  WHEN 'net_equals_components' THEN 'Net = Inflows - Outflows'
  WHEN 'net_equals_income_minus_expenses' THEN 'Net = Income - Expenses'
  WHEN 'outflow_to_inflow_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Outflow/Inflow Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Savings % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_derivation' THEN 'Savings Rate Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_within_bounds' THEN 'Savings Rate Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'total_matches_fact' THEN 'Total Matches Fact Table'
  WHEN 'transaction_count_matches_fact' THEN 'Transaction Count Match'
  WHEN 'txn_amount_abs_consistency' THEN 'Transaction Amount Consistency'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_matches_fact' THEN 'Uncategorized Matches Fact'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized % Within Threshold'
  WHEN 'viz_outflows_match_budget_expenses' THEN 'Viz Outflows Match Budget'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_expense' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Expense'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_income' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Income'
  WHEN 'yoy_expenses_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Expenses Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'yoy_income_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Income Within Bounds'
  ELSE test_name
END AS "Test", left_value AS "Left Value", right_value AS "Right Value", delta AS "Delta", pass AS "Pass", notes AS "Notes" FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_tests WHERE period_date = (SELECT p FROM latest) ORDER BY domain, test_name;
SELECT period_date AS time, failed FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_summary WHERE period_date >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '12 months') ORDER BY period_date;

SELECT period_date AS "Period Date", domain AS "Domain", CASE test_name
  WHEN 'cash_flow_margin_derivation' THEN 'Cash Flow Margin Calculation'
  WHEN 'category_sum_coverage_ok' THEN 'Category Sum Coverage'
  WHEN 'cat_family_alignment' THEN 'Family Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_food_alignment' THEN 'Food Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_household_alignment' THEN 'Household Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_mortgage_alignment' THEN 'Mortgage Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'daily_eom_matches_fact_eom (sum across accounts)' THEN 'Daily EOM vs Fact EOM Balance'
  WHEN 'equation_assets_minus_liabilities' THEN 'Assets - Liabilities = Net Worth'
  WHEN 'expense_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Expense % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Expense Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_within_bounds' THEN 'Expense Ratio Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'income_uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized Income %'
  WHEN 'mbs_expenses_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Expenses Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_income_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Income Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_net_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Net Match Fact'
  WHEN 'net_equals_components' THEN 'Net = Inflows - Outflows'
  WHEN 'net_equals_income_minus_expenses' THEN 'Net = Income - Expenses'
  WHEN 'outflow_to_inflow_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Outflow/Inflow Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Savings % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_derivation' THEN 'Savings Rate Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_within_bounds' THEN 'Savings Rate Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'total_matches_fact' THEN 'Total Matches Fact Table'
  WHEN 'transaction_count_matches_fact' THEN 'Transaction Count Match'
  WHEN 'txn_amount_abs_consistency' THEN 'Transaction Amount Consistency'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_matches_fact' THEN 'Uncategorized Matches Fact'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized % Within Threshold'
  WHEN 'viz_outflows_match_budget_expenses' THEN 'Viz Outflows Match Budget'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_expense' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Expense'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_income' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Income'
  WHEN 'yoy_expenses_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Expenses Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'yoy_income_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Income Within Bounds'
  ELSE test_name
END AS "Test", left_value AS "Left Value", right_value AS "Right Value", delta AS "Delta", pass AS "Pass", notes AS "Notes" FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_tests WHERE period_date >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '6 months') ORDER BY period_date DESC, domain, test_name;
SELECT period_date AS "Period Date", status AS "Status", passed AS "Passed", failed AS "Failed", total AS "Total" FROM reporting.rpt_outflows_reconciliation_summary ORDER BY period_date DESC LIMIT 1;

WITH latest AS (SELECT MAX(period_date) AS p FROM reporting.rpt_outflows_reconciliation_tests) SELECT period_date AS "Period Date", CASE test_name
  WHEN 'cash_flow_margin_derivation' THEN 'Cash Flow Margin Calculation'
  WHEN 'category_sum_coverage_ok' THEN 'Category Sum Coverage'
  WHEN 'cat_family_alignment' THEN 'Family Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_food_alignment' THEN 'Food Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_household_alignment' THEN 'Household Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_mortgage_alignment' THEN 'Mortgage Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'daily_eom_matches_fact_eom (sum across accounts)' THEN 'Daily EOM vs Fact EOM Balance'
  WHEN 'equation_assets_minus_liabilities' THEN 'Assets - Liabilities = Net Worth'
  WHEN 'expense_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Expense % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Expense Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_within_bounds' THEN 'Expense Ratio Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'income_uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized Income %'
  WHEN 'mbs_expenses_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Expenses Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_income_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Income Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_net_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Net Match Fact'
  WHEN 'net_equals_components' THEN 'Net = Inflows - Outflows'
  WHEN 'net_equals_income_minus_expenses' THEN 'Net = Income - Expenses'
  WHEN 'outflow_to_inflow_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Outflow/Inflow Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Savings % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_derivation' THEN 'Savings Rate Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_within_bounds' THEN 'Savings Rate Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'total_matches_fact' THEN 'Total Matches Fact Table'
  WHEN 'transaction_count_matches_fact' THEN 'Transaction Count Match'
  WHEN 'txn_amount_abs_consistency' THEN 'Transaction Amount Consistency'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_matches_fact' THEN 'Uncategorized Matches Fact'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized % Within Threshold'
  WHEN 'viz_outflows_match_budget_expenses' THEN 'Viz Outflows Match Budget'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_expense' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Expense'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_income' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Income'
  WHEN 'yoy_expenses_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Expenses Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'yoy_income_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Income Within Bounds'
  ELSE test_name
END AS "Test", left_value AS "Left Value", right_value AS "Right Value", delta AS "Delta", pass AS "Pass", notes AS "Notes" FROM reporting.rpt_outflows_reconciliation_tests WHERE period_date = (SELECT p FROM latest) ORDER BY test_name;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT month, account_name, amount, count, example_transaction, suggested_category, suggested_subcategory, confidence
  FROM reporting.viz_uncategorized_missing_example_top5
  ORDER BY amount DESC
)
SELECT * FROM data
UNION ALL
SELECT 'N/A', 'None', 0, 0, 'No uncategorized transactions'::text, 'N/A', 'N/A', 0
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM data);

SELECT priority_rank AS "Priority Rank", domain AS "Domain", CASE test_name
  WHEN 'cash_flow_margin_derivation' THEN 'Cash Flow Margin Calculation'
  WHEN 'category_sum_coverage_ok' THEN 'Category Sum Coverage'
  WHEN 'cat_family_alignment' THEN 'Family Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_food_alignment' THEN 'Food Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_household_alignment' THEN 'Household Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_mortgage_alignment' THEN 'Mortgage Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'daily_eom_matches_fact_eom (sum across accounts)' THEN 'Daily EOM vs Fact EOM Balance'
  WHEN 'equation_assets_minus_liabilities' THEN 'Assets - Liabilities = Net Worth'
  WHEN 'expense_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Expense % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Expense Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_within_bounds' THEN 'Expense Ratio Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'income_uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized Income %'
  WHEN 'mbs_expenses_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Expenses Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_income_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Income Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_net_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Net Match Fact'
  WHEN 'net_equals_components' THEN 'Net = Inflows - Outflows'
  WHEN 'net_equals_income_minus_expenses' THEN 'Net = Income - Expenses'
  WHEN 'outflow_to_inflow_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Outflow/Inflow Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Savings % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_derivation' THEN 'Savings Rate Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_within_bounds' THEN 'Savings Rate Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'total_matches_fact' THEN 'Total Matches Fact Table'
  WHEN 'transaction_count_matches_fact' THEN 'Transaction Count Match'
  WHEN 'txn_amount_abs_consistency' THEN 'Transaction Amount Consistency'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_matches_fact' THEN 'Uncategorized Matches Fact'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized % Within Threshold'
  WHEN 'viz_outflows_match_budget_expenses' THEN 'Viz Outflows Match Budget'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_expense' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Expense'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_income' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Income'
  WHEN 'yoy_expenses_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Expenses Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'yoy_income_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Income Within Bounds'
  ELSE test_name
END AS "Test", affected_dashboard AS "Affected Dashboard", recommended_action AS "Recommended Action", financial_impact AS "Financial Impact", status AS "Status" FROM reporting.rpt_reconciliation_fix_order ORDER BY priority_rank;

SELECT blocker_rank AS "Blocker Rank", blocker_name AS "Blocker Name", severity AS "Severity", failure_count AS "Failure Count", total_financial_impact AS "Total Financial Impact", impact_description AS "Impact Description", affected_dashboards AS "Affected Dashboards", remediation_steps AS "Remediation Steps" FROM reporting.rpt_data_quality_blockers ORDER BY blocker_rank;

options.content:
## Check Details
Failed checks and affected dashboards.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT domain AS "Domain", CASE test_name
  WHEN 'cash_flow_margin_derivation' THEN 'Cash Flow Margin Calculation'
  WHEN 'category_sum_coverage_ok' THEN 'Category Sum Coverage'
  WHEN 'cat_family_alignment' THEN 'Family Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_food_alignment' THEN 'Food Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_household_alignment' THEN 'Household Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'cat_mortgage_alignment' THEN 'Mortgage Category Alignment'
  WHEN 'daily_eom_matches_fact_eom (sum across accounts)' THEN 'Daily EOM vs Fact EOM Balance'
  WHEN 'equation_assets_minus_liabilities' THEN 'Assets - Liabilities = Net Worth'
  WHEN 'expense_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Expense % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Expense Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'expense_ratio_within_bounds' THEN 'Expense Ratio Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'income_uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized Income %'
  WHEN 'mbs_expenses_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Expenses Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_income_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Income Match Fact'
  WHEN 'mbs_net_matches_fact' THEN 'Budget Net Match Fact'
  WHEN 'net_equals_components' THEN 'Net = Inflows - Outflows'
  WHEN 'net_equals_income_minus_expenses' THEN 'Net = Income - Expenses'
  WHEN 'outflow_to_inflow_ratio_derivation' THEN 'Outflow/Inflow Ratio Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_pct_matches_mbs' THEN 'Savings % Matches Budget'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_derivation' THEN 'Savings Rate Calculation'
  WHEN 'savings_rate_within_bounds' THEN 'Savings Rate Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'total_matches_fact' THEN 'Total Matches Fact Table'
  WHEN 'transaction_count_matches_fact' THEN 'Transaction Count Match'
  WHEN 'txn_amount_abs_consistency' THEN 'Transaction Amount Consistency'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_matches_fact' THEN 'Uncategorized Matches Fact'
  WHEN 'uncategorized_pct_within_threshold' THEN 'Uncategorized % Within Threshold'
  WHEN 'viz_outflows_match_budget_expenses' THEN 'Viz Outflows Match Budget'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_expense' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Expense'
  WHEN 'viz_vs_budget_income' THEN 'Viz vs Budget Income'
  WHEN 'yoy_expenses_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Expenses Within Bounds'
  WHEN 'yoy_income_within_bounds' THEN 'YoY Income Within Bounds'
  ELSE test_name
END AS "Test", affected_entity_type AS "Affected Entity Type", entity_category AS "Entity Category", delta AS "Delta", notes AS "Notes", recommended_dashboard AS "Recommended Dashboard", status AS "Status" FROM reporting.rpt_reconciliation_check_details WHERE NOT pass ORDER BY domain, test_name;

panels.description: Latest reconciliation test period and reporting refresh timestamp.

targets.rawSql:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT MAX(period_date) AS data_through
  FROM reporting.rpt_financials_reconciliation_summary
), refresh AS (
  SELECT MAX(report_generated_at) AS last_refresh
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(TO_CHAR((SELECT data_through FROM base), 'YYYY-MM'), 'N/A') AS "Data Through",
  COALESCE(TO_CHAR((SELECT last_refresh FROM refresh), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'N/A') AS "Last Refresh"

panels.title: Data Freshness
